original_text: and Abimelek asked Abraham, “What is the meaning of these seven ewe lambs you have set apart by themselves?”
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 아브라함에게 이르되 이 일곱 암양 새끼를 따로 놓음은 어찜이냐

sentences.original_text: What is the meaning of these seven ewe lambs
sentences.korean_translation: 이 일곱 마리 어린 암양의 의미가 무엇입니까

sentences.original_text: you have set apart by themselves
